content: we are looking for fhir test servers, where we can upload our data? And what format would it take
we are looking for fhir test servers, where we can upload our data? And what format would it take
A list of public test servers can be found here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Publicly_Available_FHIR_Servers_for_testing

Dear implementers, there is a need to set up a Demo FHIR server for an application, to be used for training for physicians.
It needs to have data for a set of test patients and physicians, in a set of clinics, with active orders, active conditions, notes, ... The data needs to be reset every day or on-demand, the dates need to be adjusted so they are current, orders need to be in unsigned stated, ... so that a Physician can go through all the flows in the app. What would you use in this case? Thanks!
